Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound #96 buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems near Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
